docs.snippet: The Nets were clearly exasperated by the referees as Jason Kidd and Joe Johnson were charged with technical fouls and Paul Pierce was charged with a flagrant foul....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Nets were clearly exasperated by the referees as Jason Kidd and Joe Johnson were charged with technical fouls and Paul Pierce was charged with a flagrant foul.

docs.snippet: When Kevin Ollie took over as Connecticut’s coach, he brought in a sports psychologist to foster chemistry for his team, which has paid off over the past two seasons....
docs.lead_paragraph: When Kevin Ollie took over as Connecticut’s coach, he brought in a sports psychologist to foster chemistry for his team, which has paid off over the past two seasons.
docs.abstract: Connecticut men's basketball coach Kevin Ollie has helped the team reached the Final Four, two years after taking over for Hall of Fame coach Jim Calhoun; Ollie credits work of sports psychologist Joe Carr for fostering team chemistry.

headline.main: Psychologist Helps Huskies Forge Lasting Bonds
